content.raw:
the gz11 packages aren't available on xenial, only bionic

for example, rendering passes on bionic but not xenial

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_rendering-install-pkg-bionic-amd64&build=32)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_rendering-install-pkg-bionic-amd64/32/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_rendering-install-pkg-bionic-amd64/32/
* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_rendering-install-pkg-xenial-amd64&build=34)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_rendering-install-pkg-xenial-amd64/34/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_rendering-install-pkg-xenial-amd64/34/

so we need a little more logic
